description: Unknown. Attested since 1951 as US student slang.

entries.meaning: (slang, sometimes derogatory) A person who is intellectual but generally introverted.
examples: They particularly enjoy making fun of one of their fellows who is not present, whom they consider a hopeless nerd â€“ until, that is, they learn he is engaged to marry the boss's daughter.

entries.meaning: (informal, sometimes derogatory) One who has an intense, obsessive interest in something.
A member of a subculture revolving around intellectualism, video games, fantasy and science fiction, comic books and assorted media. [from 1980s]
